citations.narrative:
All records of the IACUC meeting minutes and semiannual reports to the IO are maintained in an electronic database and
could not be accessed for review at the time of inspection. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of
compliance under the Animal Welfare Act. Per 9 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) 2.35(f), all required records must be
available for inspection by authorized APHIS representatives. To be corrected by August 24, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Madeline Anna, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.35(f) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
All records of the IACUC meeting minutes and semiannual reports to the IO are maintained in an electronic database and 
could not be accessed for review at the time of inspection. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of 
compliance under the Animal Welfare Act. Per 9 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) 2.35(f), all required records must be 
available for inspection by authorized APHIS representatives. To be corrected by August 24, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Madeline Anna, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
